posts.post_text: March 26, 2015 at 7:50 PM#2stepfade is a playbackproperty of a chase. it may be adjusted with a stepfade fader.a commandline solution could go like this:CodeSetvar $fromexec = ("from Executor")Setvar $toexec = ("to Executor")Setvar $sfade = ("stepfade percent")Assign StepFade At Executor $fromexec Thru $toexecExecutor $fromexec Thru $toexec At $sfadeOops /ncinput from,to, fadeassign a stepfade master to the given executorsadjust the master to the given faderevert the faderfunction back to whatever it was, via oops.(the actual adjusment of the stepfade is a playbackaction an is not part of the oops/undo-stack)
